title: ** Login to Secure Area
main_flow: User navigates to the login page at https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
5. If credentials are valid, the system displays a success message and grants access to the secure area
6. If credentials are invalid, the system displays an error message
If the user forgets their password, they can click on the "Forgot Password" link to reset their password.
If the user's account is locked, they will need to wait for a specified amount of time before they can attempt to login again.
postconditions: User has successfully logged into the secure area
User can access the features and functionality of the secure area
